summary: Test proper SKSE and SkyUI installation
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][color=#F5C908][b]Is it REALLY Installed Correctly?[/b][/color][/size]
[size=4]A simple utility to validate SKSE and SkyUI installations.[/size][/center]

[color=#F5C908][heading]Features[/heading][/color]
[list][*]Thoroughly tests SKSE version and functionality each time you start/load a game.[*]Also tests that SkyUI is installed.[*]Provides a {Test SKSE} spell that gives access to deeper diagnostics, global settings, and helpful tips.[*]User-configurable warning level so that it doesn't bug you unless something is wrong.[/list]

[color=#F5C908][heading]We LOVE SKSE and SkyUI[/heading][/color]
SKSE and SkyUI are great tools that enable us to make some fantastic mods. However, if they aren't installed correctly things wont work. Statistically, it seems that ~90% of mod issues are traceable to incorrect SKSE installation.

This is a requested update and re-posting of one of my older mods. I had hoped it would no longer be necessary, given that SKSE now has an automated installer. However, experience is showing that this is still a significant hurdle for many players, especially with properly updating SKSE.
I highly recommend [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jGKhdiJYBqo?t=11m7s]Gopher's tutorial video on installing SKSE[/url] to anyone having difficulties with installing SKSE.

SKSE and SkyUI validation is already built into most other Jaxonz mods. If you use one of them already, you may not need this.

[color=#F5C908][heading]Requirements[/heading][/color]
[list][*][url=http://skse.silverlock.org]SKSE 1.7.1[/url][*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]SkyUI[/url][/list]
[color=#F5C908][heading]Compatibility[/heading][/color]
[list][*]Fully compatible with DLC and 3rd party mods.[*]Not known to conflict with any other mod. Any load order works.[/list]
[color=#F5C908][heading]Game Safe[/heading][/color]
[list][*]Adds no scripts to objects.[*]Safely and easily remove at any time.[/list]

Keywords: test, SKSE, SkyUI, install, installation, validate

[color=#F5C908][heading]Other Great Mods from Jaxonz[/heading][/color]
[list][*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52583]Positioner[/url]: The decorator's most powerful tool to accurately and easily move/copy/scale any object in-game.[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57335]Renamer[/url]: Easily rename objects, equipment, containers, people, creatures, horses, pets, player homes, and just about anything.[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52927]Smart Looter[/url]: Automatically gathers the good stuff and leaves the junk, allowing you to focus on the adventure.[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53641]Blink Teleport[/url]: Amazingly powerful and fun! Blip to anywhere in the blink of an eye.[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56545]Subtle Cloak Graphics[/url]: Be able to actually see when using a flame/frost/lightning cloak.[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55474]Lights Please[/url]: Easily use magical lighting spells without disarming.[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53365]Archery Focus[/url]: Automatically helps you aim when using bows and crossbows.[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53268]Archery Perks[/url]: Adds tracer shots and automated arrow collection to the archery perk tree.[/list]
All Jaxonz mods are professionally coded for stability and high quality.
author: Jaxonz

files.changelogHtml:
Changed default to only notify if tests fail.
Revised battery of SKSE function tests.
